description:
Made from organically grown cotton and sewn in Fair Trade Certified factories, this graphic tee is a staple in an outdoorsy kid's wardrobe.Made from 100% organically grown cotton ringspun jersey.Screen-print inks are PVC and phthalate free.Fair Trade Certified. Your purchase of this item supports better working conditions for the factory workers who made it. For each product sold, they earn a premium to increase their earnings and fight poverty in their communities.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Patagonia P-6 Logo Organic T-Shirt - Boys' - Youths
